summary:
Tired of not being able improve your armor, tan your leather, or even smelt your ores at the one
and only, ancient Skyforge? Well, worry no more! This mod aims to improve the prexisting
skyforge to something alittle more useful.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=40][font=Mael][color=lightblue]Skyforge Plus+[/color][/font][/size][/b]
[b][color=grey]Created by:[/color][/b] [font=Mael][color=black][size=5]theBreadThief[/size][/color][/font]
[line]
[size=6][b][color=skyblue]Description:[/color][/b][/size]
[font=book antique][size=3]This mod aims to improve the lack of ... "life" that Bethesda so poorly neglected. May I add that this is the most symbolic and ancient forge in all of Skyrim, perhaps even in all of Tamriel? How could Bethesda forget about the other needs for the expert that runs this [b]magnificent bastard![/b]. No, the vanilla forge will not do. I have created a [color=cyan][size=4]BETTER[/size][/color] Skyforge. The best part about this piece of art is the Underforge Mine. Complete with a few basic ores that are essential for grinding that smithing skill. It even has some friendly mine workers to go along with the mine! However, they are currently a quite buggy, so watch out. [/size][/font]
[i][b]When will these bugs be fixed you say?[/b][/i]
[img]http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XUQxq8LKjvQ/TvT9wthOTUI/AAAAAAAACpQ/ngkAvyEUl-s/s1600/20+hilarious+skyrim+pictures%252C+cartoons+and+memes+photostricks.blogspot.com+13.jpg[/img]
[line]
[font=book antique][size=6][b][color=skyblue]Bugs/known glithces:[/color][/b][/size]
[size=3]-NPC's that work in the mine will not properly use the ladder to navigate between the levels of the mine. I'm still working on trying to fix this
-Followers that you have with you may not follow you down in the pit properly, so keep that in mind.
-selling ores to the miners works :) [s]currently doesn't work yet, I am hoping to include a patch of being able to in the next update.[/s][/size][/font]
[line]
[font=book antique][size=6][b][color=skyblue]Noteworthy notes you should take note of:[/color][/b][/size][/font]
[size=3][b][color=red]-THIS MOD IS 100% CLEANED, SO THERE IS NO NEED FOR YOU TO CLEAN IT YOURSELF!!![/color][/b]
-FOR GODS SAKE, IF YOU WANT TO SWITCH OVER TO THE MINEFREE VERSION OR VISE-VERSA, UNINSTALL THE OTHER ONE FIRST AND THEN DOWNLOAD THE VERSION YOU WANT!! YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!
-No DLC's, or other mods are required to have this, [b][color=black]the only thing that you need in order to run this is the latest update of Syrim[/color][/b].
-I will update this when deemed necessary, so keep a check up on this as often as you can.[/size]
[line]
[size=6][b][color=skyblue]Mod Conflicts[/color][/b][/size]
[size=3]-Any mod that interacts/changes the landscape around the Skyrforge may potentially interfere with this mod.
-Nothing else really.[/size]
[line]
[size=6][b][color=cyan]CREDITS:[/color][/b][/size][/center]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4672007/?]-DarkFox127[/url] for tutorial on creating custom AI packages[/size]
[line]
[i][color=green]Feel free to leave a comment if you have any questions or you can PM me and I will get to your request as soon as I can! Also, don't forget to [color=cyan][b]endorse[/b][/color] if you enjoyed the mod! :)[/color][/i]
author: theBreadThief

files.name: Skyforge Plus - JK's AIO City Enhancer Compatible
